charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] came across
Lacey, seemingly having fun, and an
exasperated-looking Bede.
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_0200_1:
Please, could you say something to this
person, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_0300_1:
She won’t stop gushing over my Rapidash
and calling him cute.
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_0400_1: But he IS cute! I can’t help it!
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_0402_1000_1: *sigh* I clearly asked the wrong person.
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_1100_1: But I suppose you two DO have good taste.
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_1200_1:
I should praise you for noticing my
Rapidash’s superiority.
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_1400_1: You must’ve raised him with LOTS of love!
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_1500_1: We’ve been together since Galar, after all.
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_1600_1:
Even before the old gran—I mean,
Ms. Opal—started teaching me as a
Fairy-type user.
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_1700_1:
We’ve battled together ever since he was
a Ponyta.
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_1800_1: Ms. Opal? Is she your master?
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_1900_1: I suppose you could say that.
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_2000_1:
She’s an EXTREMELY experienced Gym Leader
back in Galar.
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_2100_1:
Wow—impressive! I bet she’s taught
you tons!
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_2200_1:
Indeed. I spend my days in a pink whirlwind
of Fairy-type quizzes and battles.
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_2300_1:
I love quizzes! It’d be so fun to chat
with her!
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_2400_1:
Honestly, I don’t think you’d be so excited
after meeting her.
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_2500_1:
Once you’ve tasted her trick questions,
you’ll be singing a different tune.
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_2600_1: I see... Now I’m even MORE intrigued!
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_2700_1:
*sigh*
I suppose only Rapidash can understand.
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_2800_1:
You’ve fought beside me all this time,
even when I was focusing on Psychic-type
Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_2900_1:
I’ll have to return the favor to you as well
someday.
charaepi_ch0246_80_beet/2301_1201_3100_1: Oh, never mind! I misspoke, is all!
